post.body: Thanks so much! I'm psyched!
We haven't seen either yet, but I love the music to Madagascar, too!
LOL! How was the movie?
LOL! That's too funny.
Love that Santa Tracker! LOL! It so cool! We have ours on, too!
I hear ya! I've been telling my pub I'm going to get this new book to her!
JenniferLeeland @LexValentine Me, too. I need to get moving on this sci-fi erotic romance I'm working on!
Good way to put it. I'd rather have bananas or peaches, or strawberries,or pineapples. Or green grapes.
Pears aren't my favorite fruit, but I'll eat them

Merry Christmas, everyone!
We' re back from church, going to have dinner, and then watch The Librarian on DVR!
Chat with romance author Selena Illyria Alpha Males and Their Authors right now http://tinyurl.com/5erxcl
Today's hunk is up on my blog and he's waiting for you under the Christmas tree! http://paigetylertheauthor.blogspot.com
I couldn't make this stuff up! LOL!
